channel.title: Performance on juri.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on juri.dev

item.title: Common Chunk and Lazy Loading in Angular
item.description: Since I get this question often, why not write it down! What we’re going to look at in this article is lazy loading in Angular, but in specific about the “common chunk” and the “commonChunk” option in the Angular builder configuration.

item.title: Talk: Lazy Loading on Steroids with Angular Elements
item.description: Last week I was invited to jsbe.io, a JS meetup in Bruxelles (Belgium) to talk about lazy loading in Angular in combination with Angular Elements. Here is the recording and slides of my talk.

item.title: Lazy load Angular Components
item.description: Lazy loading is hot recently and for a good reason. It’s all about speed! The Chrome team at Google in specific (around Addy Osmani) tries to push out content (and new APIs) to optimize the heck out of web pages.
